frontmatter.title: Milan 2019
frontmatter.venue_address: Piazza Luigi di Savoia, 6, 20124 Milano MI
frontmatter.lead_text: The Milan OpenShift Commons Gathering features speakers from Red Hat, Microsoft and OpenShift Commons member organizations.
frontmatter.info_text:
The OpenShift Commons Gathering brings together experts from all over the world to discuss container technologies, best practices for cloud native application developers and
  the open source software projects that underpin the OpenShift/Kuberenetes ecosystem. The Milan event will gather developers, devops professionals and sysadmins together to explore
  the next steps in making container technologies successful and secure at scale.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Collaboration in Action
Red Hat's Unified Hybrid Cloud Vision
OpenShift 4.1 Release Update and Road Map
State of the Operators: Framework, SDKs, Hubs and beyond
Update on OKD4 and Fedora CoreOS
Open Banking with Microservices Architectures and Apache Kafka on OpenShift
State of Serverless: Knative, Istio, Kiali and OpenShift
AMA Panel - Red Hat Project Leads, Product Managers and Engineers
